thread.title: Bank holiday rail strike
thread.title_full: Bank holiday rail strike - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bank holiday rail strike
text:
Going nowhere fast - passengers are being urged to check before travelling today Credit: Ben Birchall/PA Wire/Press Association Images Rail passengers planning to travel on First Great Western face another day of disruption with the continuation of a strike that started last Friday.
Services in some areas are badly affected by action from the RMT union over the introduction of new high-speed trains. The walk out is due to finish at midnight.
Travel First Great Western Rail strike
